title: Alpha
deck: Got questions about life? Eager to explore Christianity further?
article:
Got questions about life? Eager to explore Christianity further? 

Alpha is an opportunity for people to investigate the Christian faith for themselves. It's relaxed, friendly and fun, with food, a short video talk and plenty of time for discussion and questions. 

Alpha is really for anyone who's curious. Exploring topics such as "Is there more to life than this?" and "Who is Jesus?"

Next Alpha is over 4 consecutive Wednesdays starting 2nd October, 7.15pm.
